definitions.body: lying, [[אֲכַלְתֶּם]] ´[[פְּרִי כ]] Ho 10:13 ye have eaten the fruit of lying; Ho 7:3 (‖[[רָעָה]]), Ho 12:1; of Nineveh, [[פֶּרֶק מְלֵאָה]] ´[[כ]] Na 3:1 of lying (and) robbery it is full; Ps 59:13 (‖[[אָלָה]]).
of Job's affliction Job 16:8 my leanness hath risen up against me (cf. Ps 109:24; Targum J Ge 41:27, Ec 12:5; Talm. [[כחשׁא]]; > my lying, i.e. my affliction regarded as a lying witness, Di Buhl al.)
